text: "Gimme Little Sign" is a 1967 song by Brenton Wood. It went to number 9 in the United States, number 8 in both the United Kingdom and Australia, number 20 in New Zealand and number 17 in Canada. It went on to be covered by Jo Jo Zep & The Falcons, Peter Andre and Danielle Brisebois. ==References== Category:1967 songs Category:Soul songs Category:Jo Jo Zep & The Falcons songs Category:Peter Andre songs
title: Gimme Little Sign
